title: Crunchy Sandwich with classic zibas
ingredients: ½ Cup of chopped black olives
½ Cup of chili red canned pepper
½ Cup of finely chopped celery
instructions: Step 1. Unta mayonnaise and mustard on each slice of bread
Step 2. Place 2 slices of sausages, then 2 cheese and continue the process to use everything.
Step 3. Add the olive salad up, and end with a layer of classic zibas.
Step 4. Cover with the slice of bread and serves.
